'''Points of Interest''' ('''POI'''s) are specific noteworthy locations on the [[map]], such as buildings and small parts of [[cities]]. Noteworthy locations often satisfy at least one of the following conditions:
* Has a name that shows up when entering the location in the open world, similar to [[subarea]] names
* Has a name used in official material, such as in NPC dialogue, books, and items
* Is an [[instance]]
* Provides a player service, such as being a [[shop]]
* Features special player interactions, such as being a bulletin board
* Has unique geographical or architectural features
* Has lore importance
